channel.title: Econometrics on Jonas Gathen
channel.description: Recent content in Econometrics on Jonas Gathen

item.title: Explained variance & theory completeness
item.description: This post deals with a general topic I have long thought about and which touches upon many different areas of applied work. I recently attended a conference on the developmental origins of economic preferences here in Toulouse, organized by the wonderful Institute for Advanced Studies Toulouse, which put this topic back on my mind and made me want to write this piece. Specifically, there were two encounters or observations that spawned my interest.
